name.//~: Pun on 'deca-' prefix for 10 and 'decimate', with it's meaning for killing
Pun on 'cent-' prefix for 100 and 'sentinel', as in its connection to guarding or protection that may involve killing
Pun on 'myriad' derived from the Ancient Greek for 10000 and 'murder'
Pun on 'hetsy' meaning 100000 in Malagasy and 'hit' as the slang for kill

name: The first day of the rest of their unlives
description: Survive for a day and find a safe place to sleep

name: Thank God it's Friday
description: Survive for a week

name: 28 days later
description: Survive for a month

name: A time to every purpose under heaven
description: Survive for a season

name: Brighter days ahead?
description: Survive for a year

name: Pheidippides was a hack
description: Run a marathon… plus a little more.

name: Please don't fall down at my door
description: Walk 500 miles, then walk 500 more.

name: Test Drive
//: Approx distance covered by Bertha Benz in 1888 drive

name: Too Far Inside a Car
//: From the song by Modest Mouse; 1100 miles = 1770278 m

name: Chicago to L.A.
//: From the song by Bobby Troup; 1926 alignment; 2448 miles = 3939674 m

name: Head of the Charles
//: Prestigious rowing race held in Boston

name: Plymouth to Plymouth
//: Approx distance sailed by the Pilgrims

name: Circumnavigator
//: Approx distance covered by the Magellan–Elcano expedition

name: Frequent Flyer
//: 40,000 miles to qualify for Star Alliance Gold status

name: I have full control of the car, I swear.
The human body was not designed for this

requirements.description: Return to the location you started the game

name: Timber
description: If a tree falls in a forest and no one is around to hear it, does it make a sound?

name: Lumberjack
description: What is a forest for a man with an axe?

name: Deforestation
description: If you cut down the trees you will find the wolf.

name: Grave Digger
description: That's exactly what we need: more dead bodies.

name: Grave Robber
description: Hey, what if they turned down there?  You gotta check.

name: Funeral
description: It's a privilege to be buried when billions will not be.

name: Undertaker
description: Leave no one to rot among the living dead.

name: Funeral House
description: You cannot bury the whole world, can you?

name: Cyberpunk
description: Spiritus quidem promptus; caro vero infirma.

name: Clockwork Man
description: By most mechanical and dirty hand.  I shall have such revenges on you… both.  The things I will do, what they are, yet I know not.  But they will be the terrors of the earth.

name: Homo Evolutis
description: The world of man has ended.  Long live the world of transhumanity.

name: At first I was afraid, I was petrified…
Don't drive a limousine, become it
How did I ever get surrounded by such undead neighbors?
Spelunking: a lifestyle, not a hobby
Carrying your home on your back
What doesn't kill you, makes you stranger
Broken But Not Defeated
description: Does your medical insurance cover that?

name: Talkative
description: Hi. Nice to meet you!

name: Eloquent
description: We're friends, aren't we?

name: Silver Tongue
description: Legend has it you convinced a zombie hulk to go away.

name: Help Desk
description: Have you tried turning it off and back on again?

name: HackerMan
description: This OS has a back door.  There is always a back door.

name: Still not quite like Kevin
description: It's not cheating.  It's debugging.

name: Nurse Practitioner
description: Clean and disinfected.

name: MD
description: Is there a doctor in the house?

name: Dr. House
description: It's lupus.

name: Amateur Mechanic
description: Righty tighty, lefty loosey.

name: Engineer
description: Just give me my wrench.

name: MacGyver
description: This whole deal is holding on faith, spit, and duct tape.

name: Rigging
description: This will slow them down!

name: Trapper
description: A good trap doesn't discriminate between beavers and zombeavers.

name: Minesweeper
description: All it takes is one mistake.

name: Student Driver
description: Easy on the brakes.

name: Ace Driver
description: No turn is too sharp.

name: The Stig
description: Formula One is for Sunday drivers.

name: Swimmer
description: I can doggie paddle.

name: Swimmer
description: Like a fish to water.

name: Michael Phelps
description: Faster than Jaws.

name: Household Handyman
description: If I have the instructions, I can make it work.

name: Do-It-Yourselfer
description: Take this thing, put it in that thing, and voila.

name: Jack of All Trades
description: With the right amount of glue, there is nothing I can't do.

name: Home Cook
description: I can handle a roast.

name: Master Chef
description: Glazed tenderloin is a cakewalk.

name: Hell's Kitchen
description: Today's menu: Soupe a l'oignon, Boeuf Bourguignon, and Creme brulee.

name: Patchwork
description: Fixing tears isn't too bad.

name: Tailor
description: A needle, a thread, and a dream.

name: Fashion Designer
description: From catwalk to Cataclysm.

name: Enthusiast
description: I just love the outdoors!

name: Survivalist
description: Survival is my game.

name: Bear Grylls
description: So you say you can survive on your own urine?

name: Shocking
description: One is positive, one is negative.

name: Ohm's Law
description: Thunder Ohm.  Two volts enter, one volt leaves.  Resistance is futile.

name: Nicola Tesla
description: One does not simply taste a 9 V battery.

name: Bowman
description: Draw, aim and release.

name: Bull's Eye
description: Better than Legolas.

name: Robin Hood
description: Wilhelm Tell?  Never heard of.

name: Marksman
description: Lead the target.

name: Eagle Eye
description: Only me and my target.

name: Deadshot
description: Don't run.  You'll die tired.

name: Gunner
description: Serious Hardware.

name: Heavy Gunner
description: Caliber makes the difference.

name: Rocket Man
description: I'm sending you to the moon.  In pieces.

name: Pistoleer
description: Don't forget the one in the chamber.

name: Small But Deadly
description: Caliber doesn't count when you're on the receiving end of the barrel.

name: Dirty Harry
description: But being this is a .44 Magnum, the most powerful handgun in the world and would blow your head clean off, you've gotta ask yourself one question:  Do I feel lucky?  Well, do ya, punk?

name: Recruit
description: Point towards enemy and squeeze trigger.

name: Rifleman
description: This is my rifle.  There are many like it, but this one is mine.  My rifle is my best friend.  It is my life.  I must master it as I must master my life.

name: Soldier
description: Without me, my rifle is useless.  Without my rifle, I am useless.  I will keep my rifle clean and ready, even as I am clean and ready.  We will become part of each other.

name: Buckshot Barrage
description: This is my BOOMSTICK!

name: Double Barrel, Double Fun
description: When you want to hit your target nine times with one shot.

name: Elmer Fudd
description: What's up doc?  Hunting wabbits?

name: Burst Fire
description: Volume is a good strategy.

name: Spray'n'Pray
description: One will hit.  It's a matter of statistics.

name: SMG Goes BRRRT!
description: We definitely need more ammo.

name: Fling!
description: Go that way!

name: Yeet!
description: And never come back.

name: Kobe Bryant
description: Frag out!

name: Fighter
description: I can take a punch.

name: Brawler
description: Bottle in left hand, chair leg in right hand.

name: Street Fighter
description: It's winning that matters, not the style.

name: Batter
description: Every strike brings me closer to a home run.

name: Beater
description: If you beat them enough, they stay down.

name: Stone Age
description: Cudgel was humanity's first tool.  And it may be its last, so why not master it?

name: Edged Combat
description: Blades are one of man's most useful tools.  It was true then and it's even more true now.

name: Way of the Sword
description: When the sword is once drawn, the passions of men observe no bounds of moderation.

name: Miyamoto Musashi
description: The sword has to be more than a simple weapon; it has to be an answer to life's questions.

name: Avoidant
description: Better to move than to be still.

name: Elusive
description: The strongest of blows is nothing if it doesn't land.

name: Neo
description: But can you dodge a bullet?

name: Precise
description: I strike where I mean to.

name: Cold Steel
description: While you were partying, I studied the blade.

name: Jack the Ripper
description: Is this a dagger which I see before me, the handle toward my hand?  Come, let me clutch thee.

name: Pugilist
description: There is strength in my hands.

name: Road to Shaolin
description: I feel an army in my fist.

name: Mr. Miyagi
description: To be your own weapon.

name: Periodic Table
description: I remember some of this from school.

name: Chemical engineer
description: It's somewhat like cooking.  Just don't lick the spoon.

name: Heisenberg
description: You all know who I am.  I'm the cook.  Say my name.

name: Reality is falling apart
description: You will be baked, and then there will be cake.

name: True Freedom
description: And to think you hesitated.

name: Killed the XEDRA officer
description: The haunting has finished and I am victorious.

name: Arcade Mode
//: this is the achievement that lets you forever have meta progression disabled
description: STOP HAND-HOLDING ME!!!

requirements.description: Do you have a few minutes to talk about our lord and saviour Jesus Christ?

name: I can see my house from here!
Lifestyles of the rich and fetid!
Zombie PD, to protect and zombify!
Avid Reader
description: Read any book 250 times

name: Dedicated Reader
description: Read any book 500 times

name: Bibliophile
description: Read any book 1000 times

name: That's not supposed to bend that way!
